Shokaract: Ahh! Ears can't take words! Now VERY p*ssed off!!!!

Shokaract s=
uddenly puts away his blasters and fires a huge energy blast from his cuppe=
d together hands! Eek! Pit Power! He aims the wrecking beam at Hell Drak an=
d lets it loose!...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Testifier: Aby=
ssian Badass 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, September 15,=
 2001 12:14 AM
  Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


  " No way fuckwhea=
t," Hell Drak stuttered, scared out of her sputnick whits.
    ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
    From: Roland the Last Gunslinger 
    To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, September 14, 2001 7:24 PM
    Subject: Re: =
Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


    OOC: Nooooooo! Not the shits!

    BIC: Shoka=
ract did not know he had those deadly shits. He raised his cannon and fired=
 3 more shits at Hell Drak! They were about to collide with Hell Drak's shi=
ts, when suddenly, the rule of no interception came into play! The disks sl=
iced into Shokaract, spilling mech fluid all around!
     
    Shokaract: A=
hh! Moder!...

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Testifier: A=
byssian Badass 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, Septe=
mber 14, 2001 4:06 PM
      Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


      "Y=
ou spudnick, you!  Damn you, spuckley!" Hell Drak yelled, avoiding some of =
the shits, but getting hit by some of the others.
       
      She fired b=
ack two sputnick lazer discuses.
        ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
    From: Roland the Last Gunslinger 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
 =
       Sent: Thursday, September 13, 2001 11:52 PM
        Subject: Re: Att=
ack!/Orion/Shokaract


        OOC: As tempted as I am, I cannot let my cha=
racters just explode. I need to keep repeating that to myself.

        BIC=
: Shokaract didn't expect the disks, and one hit him almost harmlessly, but=
 the other sliced into him. Green goo sprayed from a crevice in his side. H=
owever, he was silent about it. He aimed the gattling gun at Hell Drak and =
fired 3 laser bolts from it, then raised his tiny hot dog gun and fired 4 s=
hots from it, also aimed at Hell Drak...

          ----- Original Message =
----- 
          From: Testifier: Abyssian Badass 
          To: nbwrpg@yah=
oogroups.com 
          Sent: Thursday, September 13, 2001 7:28 AM
        =
  Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


          "No way, bitchwheat!" He=
ll Drak yelled, rolling and firing two lazer discs at Shokaract.
          =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: Roland the Last Gunslinge=
r 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Wednesday, Sep=
tember 12, 2001 11:52 PM
            Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract

=

            It hit Shokaract. EXPLODE! Somehow, the language woke Shokarac=
t from his trance, not the missile. He transformed into robot mode and beck=
oned Hell Drak to come closer with a movement of his hand...

             =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: Testifier: Abyssian Bada=
ss 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Wednesday=
, September 12, 2001 11:19 PM
              Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shok=
aract


              Hell Drak avoided the missile.
               
      =
        "Not this time, fucko!" Hell Drak yelled, firing a lazer back at Sh=
okaract.
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From=
: Roland the Last Gunslinger 
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
 =
               Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 9:53 PM
                =
Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


                The lasers his Shoka=
ract all 4 times, but he didn't seem to notice, he was fixated on some thin=
g only he could see, something from his own mind. Ahh! PSYCHO! Shokaract fi=
res a single missile back at Hell Drak...

                  ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
                  From: Testifier: Abyssian Badass 
       =
           To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

eptember 12, 2001 9:29 PM

aract


                  ::Headshot/Hell Drak/Triggerhappy::
             =
      
                  Headshot ducked by a tree.  One of Orion's shots n=
ailed him in the side.
                   
                  "Ah, f***!!!!!=
!!" Headshot yelled, holding his side in pain, getting up from being knocke=
d down.
                   
                  Headshot climbed up into the =
tree, and fired a sniper shot at Orion.  Headshot was standing up, so, if h=
e was hit......(hint hint!)
                  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
             =
     Hell Drak was hit by the two missiles.  She went flying back into a wa=
ll.  Hell Drak fired 4 lazers at Shokaract.
                  ~~~~~~~~
    =
              Triggerhappy flew out of the way of Orion's shots.  Triggerha=
ppy flew down, attempting to ram right into Orion!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!=
